text:
Hey there! Listen um... I heard from Mooney that you were able to help him with his, um, poop problem.

I have a similar issue. I've been collecting a lot of golden poop from donations to the Florens Treasury, and, well...

Whomever said that money stinks definitely hasn't smelled that Treasury. Anyway, I have a LOT of it just piling up and 

I'd like some of those fancy bags as well. Can you talk to Malu for me?
uponCompletion:
What? Are you serious? I'm not doing that again.

In theory, you should just be able to use golden poop instead of regular poop.

Why don't you try it yourself?
